name: PhaigeX: Hyperspace Survivors
description:
"Here at PhaigeX Megacorp, we pioneer the latest trends in AI and Warp technologies.
Join our elite team of Confiners to keep our space pathways safe from the rogue AI menace.
It is our mission to pave the way towards humanity's shining future, whatever it takes.
So take the leap, and accomplish great achievements together with us!"

"High-Speed Space Combat Survivor"

Bob, weave, evade, and shoot through a space sector filled to the brim with enemies. The game is built with rushes and high-speed chases in mind, so make full use of your mobility and firepower.

"Show Your Way"

Choose from a variety of ships to pilot, each with its own stats, starting weapons and passive abilities. Upgrade its equipment, and create builds that suit your play style.

"Death by a Thousand Cuts"

The enemy forces build up as time passes, increasing the Incursion Rate. As this value rises, new events and dangerous threats enter the fray. Keep this value down by destroying key enemy units to prevent yourself from getting overwhelmed.

"You are Not Alone"

Aside from the ship you control, you can summon your Support Craft into the field for extra firepower. Not only that, approach it to open up the Support Shop, where you upgrade your ship and use other support actions.

"Never Tell Me the Odds"

You get rewards after a game session, which you can spend unlocking new ships, or customizing your ships even further and making them stronger!

Current Game Features

  • 5 playable ships
  • 2 support crafts
  • 14 weapons
  • 18 passive abilities
  • 2 game modes
